CustomField.description: Duration of the Session. The value in this field will depend on Duration Unit field. A value of 2 in this field will mean 2 Hours, if 'Hours' is selected in Duration Unit field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Duration of the Session. The value in this field will depend on Duration Unit field. A value of 2 in this field will mean 2 Hours, if 'Hours' is selected in Duration Unit field.
CustomField.label: Duration
